sn12.42:4.2: “Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti, catūhi ca sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti, ariyo cassa ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho, so ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṃ byākareyya:
sn12.42:5.1: Katamāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti?
sn12.42:5.7: imāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti.
sn12.42:7.1: Katamo cassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho?
sn12.42:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako paṭiccasamuppādaññeva sādhukaṃ yoniso manasi karoti … pe …
sn12.42:7.3: ayamassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho.
sn12.42:8.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa imāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti, imehi catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti, ayañcassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho, so ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṃ byākareyya:
sn12.42:8.2: ‘khīṇanirayomhi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto, sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano’”ti.
